data.name: CustomersSyncSql
data.value:
SELECT S1.CUSTOMER_ID ,S1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE --by fan ,S1.CUSTOMER_NUMBER ,S1.CUSTOMER_NAME ,S1.SHIP_ADDRESS_ID ,S1.BILL_ADDRESS_ID ,S1.SHIP_ADDRESS1 ,S1.BILL_ADDRESS1 ,S1.CUSTOMER_CATEGORY_CODE ,S1.MEANING ,S1.SHIP_TO_SITE_USE_ID ,S1.INVOICE_TO_SITE_USE_ID ,S1.ORDER_TYPE_ID ,S1.TYPE_NAME ,S1.PRICE_LIST_ID ,S3.CURRENCY_CODE --by fan ,S1.SALESREP_ID ,S1.SALES_NAME ,S2.AREA_CODE ,S2.PHONE ,S2.CONTACT_ID ,S2.CON_NAME ,S2.FAX FROM ( SELECT RC.CUSTOMER_ID ,RC.LAST_UPDATE_DATE --by fan ,RC.CUSTOMER_NUMBER ,RC.CUSTOMER_NAME ,RC.CUSTOMER_CATEGORY_CODE ,AL.MEANING ,RA.ADDRESS_ID SHIP_ADDRESS_ID ,RA.ADDRESS1 SHIP_ADDRESS1 ,RA2.ADDRESS_ID BILL_ADDRESS_ID ,RA2.ADDRESS1 BILL_ADDRESS1 ,RSUS.SITE_USE_ID SHIP_TO_SITE_USE_ID ,RSUB.SITE_USE_ID INVOICE_TO_SITE_USE_ID ,RSUB.TYPE_NAME ,RSUB.ORDER_TYPE_ID ,SALES.SALESREP_ID ,SALES.NAME SALES_NAME ,RSUB.STATUS BILL_STATUS ,RSUS.STATUS SHIP_STATUS ,RSUS.PRICE_LIST_ID FROM AR.RA_CUSTOMERS RC ,AR.RA_ADDRESSES_ALL RA ,AR.RA_ADDRESSES_ALL RA2 ,AR.RA_SALESREPS_ALL SALES ,( SELECT * FROM AR.RA_SITE_USES_ALL WHERE SITE_USE_CODE = 'SHIP_TO' AND PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' AND STATUS = 'A' ) RSUS ,( SELECT RSU.*,SOT.NAME TYPE_NAME FROM AR.RA_SITE_USES_ALL RSU ,OE.SO_ORDER_TYPES_ALL SOT WHERE SITE_USE_CODE = 'BILL_TO' AND RSU.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' AND RSU.STATUS = 'A' AND RSU.ORDER_TYPE_ID= SOT.ORDER_TYPE_ID(+) AND SOT.ORDER_TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL --要維護完整才能抓取 ) RSUB ,(SELECT LOOKUP_CODE, MEANING FROM AR.AR_LOOKUPS WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'CUSTOMER_CATEGORY' ) AL WHERE RC.CUSTOMER_ID = RA.CUSTOMER_ID AND RC.CUSTOMER_ID = RA2.CUSTOMER_ID AND RA.ADDRESS_ID = RSUS.ADDRESS_ID --皆已主要為主 AND RA2.ADDRESS_ID = RSUB.ADDRESS_ID --皆已主要為主 AND RSUS.PRIMARY_SALESREP_ID=SALES.SALESREP_ID(+) AND RA.STATUS = 'A' AND RC.STATUS='A' AND RC.CUSTOMER_CATEGORY_CODE = AL.LOOKUP_CODE(+) AND RA.ORG_ID = 202 AND RC.CUSTOMER_CATEGORY_CODE IS NOT NULL --要維護完整才能抓取
) S1 ,( ( SELECT PH.CUSTOMER_ID ,PH.ADDRESS_ID ,PH.PHONE ,FAX.FAX ,PH.AREA_CODE ,PH.CONTACT_ID ,PH.CON_NAME FROM ( SELECT RP.CUSTOMER_ID ,RP.PHONE_NUMBER PHONE ,RP.AREA_CODE ,RP.ADDRESS_ID ,CON.CONTACT_ID ,CON.LAST_NAME||CON.FIRST_NAME CON_NAME FROM AR.RA_PHONES RP ,AR.RA_CUSTOMERS RC ,AR.RA_CONTACTS CON WHERE RP.CONTACT_ID IS NOT NULL --已地址為主 原條件A.CONTACT_ID IS NULL AND RP.ADDRESS_ID IS NOT NULL --已地址為主 原條件沒有 AND RP.CUSTOMER_ID = RC.CUSTOMER_ID AND RP.CONTACT_ID=CON.CONTACT_ID AND RP.PHONE_TYPE = 'GEN' AND RP.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' ) PH ,( SELECT RP.CUSTOMER_ID ,RP.PHONE_NUMBER FAX ,RP.AREA_CODE ,RP.ADDRESS_ID FROM AR.RA_PHONES RP ,AR.RA_CUSTOMERS RC WHERE RP.CONTACT_ID IS NOT NULL--已地址為主 原條件A.CONTACT_ID IS NULL AND RP.ADDRESS_ID IS NOT NULL--已地址為主 原條件沒有 AND RP.CUSTOMER_ID = RC.CUSTOMER_ID AND (RP.PHONE_TYPE = 'FAX') ) FAX WHERE PH.ADDRESS_ID = FAX.ADDRESS_ID(+) ) ) S2 ,( SELECT SP.PRICE_LIST_ID, SP.CURRENCY_CODE FROM OE.SO_PRICE_LISTS SP ) S3 --by fan WHERE S1.PRICE_LIST_ID = S3.PRICE_LIST_ID --by fan AND S1.SHIP_ADDRESS_ID = S2.ADDRESS_ID(+)

data.name: DiscountsSyncSql
data.value: SELECT SD.DISCOUNT_ID, SD.NAME DISCOUNT_NAME, SD.AUTOMATIC_DISCOUNT_FLAG, SD.OVERRIDE_ALLOWED_FLAG, SP.PRICE_LIST_ID, SP.NAME LIST_NAME, --DECODE(SD.ATTRIBUTE15,'XS_HEAD_D','內銷表頭','XS_LINE_D','內銷明細','XS_HEAD_O','外銷表頭','XS_LINE_O','外銷明細') DISCOUNT_TYPE, DECODE(SD.ATTRIBUTE15,'XS_HEAD_D',1,'XS_LINE_D',2,'XS_HEAD_O',3,'XS_LINE_O',4) DISCOUNT_TYPE, SD.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM OE.SO_DISCOUNTS SD, OE.SO_PRICE_LISTS SP WHERE SP.NAME LIKE '%廈門%' AND SP.END_DATE_ACTIVE IS NULL AND SD.END_DATE_ACTIVE IS NULL AND SD.PRICE_LIST_ID = SP.PRICE_LIST_ID AND SD.ATTRIBUTE15 IS NOT NULL

data.name: InventorySyncSql
data.value: SELECT MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, CA.ITEM, MSI.DESCRIPTION,CA.UNIT_WEIGHT,CA.WEIGHT_UOM_CODE, CA.DISCOUNT,CA.SEGMENT1, CA.SEGMENT2, CA.SEGMENT3, MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID, MP.ORGANIZATION_CODE, MSI.ENABLED_FLAG, MSI.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS MSI, (SELECT MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID, MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, MSI.SEGMENT1 ITEM, MC.SEGMENT1, MC.SEGMENT2, MC.SEGMENT3,MSI.UNIT_WEIGHT,MSI.WEIGHT_UOM_CODE,XCD.DISCOUNT FROM OE.XSEEC_CATEGORY_DISCOUNT XCD, INV.MTL_ITEM_CATEGORIES MIC, INV.MTL_CATEGORIES MC, INV.MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS MSI WHERE MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = MIC.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND MIC.CATEGORY_ID = MC.CATEGORY_ID AND MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID = 228 AND MIC.ORGANIZATION_ID = 228 AND MC.STRUCTURE_ID = 50134 AND MC.SEGMENT1 NOT LIKE 'XA%' --A產品大分類不要計入 AND MC.SEGMENT2 = XCD.CATEGORY(+) ) CA, INV.MTL_PARAMETERS MP WHERE CA.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID IN (221,222,223,224,225,226,227,230,250,351,371) --只留廈門製造組織ORG ID AND MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID = MP.ORGANIZATION_ID

data.name: PriceBookSyncSql
data.value:
SELECT SPL.LIST_NAME ,SPL.PRICE_LIST_ID ,MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID ,MSI.SEGMENT1 ,MSI.PRIMARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE ,MSI.DESCRIPTION ,SPL.LIST_PRICE ,SPL.CURRENCY_CODE
FROM INV.MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS MSI
,(SELECT MSI.SEGMENT1 ITEM ,MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID ,MSI.DESCRIPTION ,SPL.LIST_PRICE ,SPL.PRICE_LIST_ID ,SP.NAME LIST_NAME ,SP.CURRENCY_CODE FROM OE.SO_PRICE_LISTS SP ,OE.SO_PRICE_LIST_LINES SPL ,INV.MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS MSI WHERE SPL.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID = 228+0 AND SP.PRICE_LIST_ID=SPL.PRICE_LIST_ID AND SPL.LIST_PRICE > 0 AND SPL.END_DATE_ACTIVE IS NULL AND SP.END_DATE_ACTIVE IS NULL AND SP.ATTRIBUTE15='Y' --FOR XS營銷系統用的價目表 AND SP.NAME LIKE '%廈門%' ) SPL WHERE MSI.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = SPL.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID =228
